org.apache.fineract.portfolio.loanproduct.data

Class LoanProductData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.fineract.portfolio.loanproduct.data.LoanProductData

  • public class LoanProductData
extends java.lang.Object
    Immutable data object to represent loan products.
